name: There is one crewmate among us . . .
name_original: There is one crewmate among us . . .
description:
Among us? No. This is something different. There is one crewmate among us...

What if there are just one crewmate and a bunch of impostors? Who knows what will happen. This is just a little revision of that. If this idea comes true, it will grow into a horror story. Hope this 2020 won't bring that to us . . .

If you love this game look up my other games on itch.io.

Comment your experience and feel free to contact me via email ( dennisbydengames@gmail.com)!

Join my discord community here : https://discord.gg/GUBrzwy.

Follow my work and see you in my next projects and games!!!
